p: Only climatic variables were used to build models because they give better projections for future scenarios than do land use variables ( Martin et al., 2013; Titeux et al., 2017). In addition, vegetation variables are strongly related to the combination of temperature and precipitation, climatic variables, giving more useful habitat approximations for huemul ( Quevedo et al., 2017). We felt that the use of multiple climatic proxies could, at least partially, overcome the lack of realistic vegetation predictions ( Wilcox et al., 2017).
